movie.title: Heavy Water
movie.description_intro: Heavy Water follows big wave surfer Nathan Fletcher through the evolution of surfing and his relationship with big waves. Tracing his lineage back to his grandfather, one of the pioneers of Oahu's North Shore, Fletcher and other fellow surf and skateboard legends share insights from the pursuit of their passion.
movie.description_full: Heavy Water follows big wave surfer Nathan Fletcher through the evolution of surfing and his relationship with big waves. Tracing his lineage back to his grandfather, one of the pioneers of Oahu's North Shore, Fletcher and other fellow surf and skateboard legends share insights from the pursuit of their passion.

movies.title: Hurá
movies.summary: Mr. Paldan shares his life story during the communist government regime in Czechoslovakia during the 50s and 60s.
movies.description_full: Mr. Paldan shares his life story during the communist government regime in Czechoslovakia during the 50s and 60s.

movies.title: Couro de Gato
movies.summary: In Rio de Janeiro, near to the Carnival, a group of boys from the slums in the hills chase cats to sell them to make a small percussion drum called "tamborim" and raise some money.
movies.description_full: In Rio de Janeiro, near to the Carnival, a group of boys from the slums in the hills chase cats to sell them to make a small percussion drum called "tamborim" and raise some money.
movies.synopsis: In Rio de Janeiro, near to the Carnival, a group of boys from the slums in the hills chase cats to sell them to make a small percussion drum called "tamborim" and raise some money.

movies.title: The Man Who Loves to Hurt Himself
movies.title_english: The Man Who Loves to Hurt Himself
movies.title_long: The Man Who Loves to Hurt Himself (2017)
movies.summary: A unique examination of the life-long existential journey taken by a self-made musician, and his unforgiving determination to express himself. It explores how he balances life, love and money with his artistic passions and the undeniable effect his fans express to him about the life altering meaning it has had on them - a first-person account. In his own words he guides us through his world by stream of consciousness which reveals an uplifting message about passion of art and love of life. If you were to have your life flash before your eyes right before you die...this film is what Steve Austin might see about himself.
movies.description_full: A unique examination of the life-long existential journey taken by a self-made musician, and his unforgiving determination to express himself. In his own words he guides us through his world by stream of consciousness which reveals an uplifting message about passion of art and love of life. If you were to have your life flash before your eyes right before you die...this film is what Steve Austin might see about himself.

movies.title: All the Wild Horses
movies.summary: All The Wild Horses documents the Mongol Derby horse race, the longest and toughest horse race in the world, and easily the most epic and dangerous, as it leads through 650 miles of Mongolian steppe, desert and mountain ranges.
movies.description_full: All The Wild Horses documents the Mongol Derby horse race, the longest and toughest horse race in the world, and easily the most epic and dangerous, as it leads through 650 miles of Mongolian steppe, desert and mountain ranges.
